alert.note: Alert for Dawson; Gosper; Phelps (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Hastings (North Central Kansas and South Central Nebraska)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 28 at 1:02AM CDT until July 28 at 1:15AM CDT by NWS Hastings
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 115 AM CDT FOR WESTERN PHELPS...GOSPER AND EASTERN DAWSON COUNTIES... At 101 AM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Overton to 6 miles southwest of Elwood to near Medicine Creek Reservoir State Recreation Area to 14 miles north of McCook, moving southeast at 45 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Lexington, Bertrand, Elwood, Overton, Loomis, Smithfield and Johnson Lake. This includes Interstate 80 between mile markers 228 and 252. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
